verses.roman:
paṇḍita kahe,--"prabhu yāi' karuna viśrāma
mui, ebe la-iba prasāda kari' samādhāna

synonyms: paṇḍita kahe—Jagadānanda Paṇḍita said; prabhu—my Lord; yāi'-going; karuna viśrāma—take rest; mui—I; ebe—now; la-iba prasāda—shall take prasāda; kari' samādhāna—after arranging.
translation: Jagadānanda replied, "My Lord, You go take rest. I shall take prasāda after I finish making some arrangements.
